description: “The Amazon Basics Drill and Driver Multi-Bit Set - 100-Piece includes: 14pcs Titanium Twist Drill Bits:1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/7/8/10mm 5pcs Masonry Drill Bits:4/5/6/8/10mm 5pcs Brad Point Drill Bits:3/4/5/6/8mm 3pcs Spade Drill Bits:16/22/25mm 8pcs Nut Driver:4/5/6/7/8/9/10/13mm 40pcs 1/4"x25mm Screwdriver Bits:PZ0,PZ0,PZ1,PZ1,PZ2,PZ2,PZ2,PZ3,PZ3,PH0,PH0,PH1,PH1,PH2,PH2,PH2,PH3,PH3,SL3,SL4,SL4,SL5,SL5,SL6,SL6,SL7,H2,H2.5,H3,H3.5,H4,H5,H6,T10,T15,T20,T25,T27,T30,T40. 12pcs 1/4"x50mm Screwdriver Bits:PZ1,PZ2,PZ2,PZ3,PH1,PH2,PH2,PH3,SL4,SL5,SL6,SL6. 3pcs Drill Stoppers 6/8/10mm 1pc Hex key: 2.5mm 1pc Arbor Adapter for Hole Saw: 6.3x80mm 4pcs Hole Saw:32/38/44/54mm 1pc Gauge 21 hole: 1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.2/3.3/3.5/4/4.2/4.5/4.8/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10mm 1pc Magnetic Bit holder:1/4”x60mm 1pc Countersink:12.5x36mm 1pc Nail Punch:0.8mm ”

feature_bullets: 100-piece drill and driver multi-bit set; ideal for metal, wood, plastic, masonry, and hole saws
Includes 52 bits, 8 nut sockets, a magnetic bit holder, 4 hole saws, and more (scroll down the page for a full list of included pieces)
Made of durable, wear-resistant alloy steel with quenching treatment
Sturdy plastic case provides designated storage space and easy transport
